description: The summary stock reconciliation for the specified period for a group of livestock defined by an inventory classification.

startDate.description: Date of the start of the period

endDate.description: Date of the end of the period

duration.description: Defines the duration that the reconciliation applies to: week, month or year

inventoryClassification.description: Defines the group of animals by their characteristics to which the reconciliation refers

open.description: The number of animals in the group at the start of the period

arrivalsTotal.description: The total number of animals that arrived during the period

arrivals.description: The array of numbers of stock that arrived and the corresponding arrival reasons.

departuresTotal.description: The total number of animals that departed during the period

departures.description: The array of numbers of stock that departed and the corresponding departure kinds.

births.description: The number of births in the group during the period.

deaths.description: The number of deaths in the group during the period.

agedIn.description: The number of livestock that became members of the group during the period through their increase in age.

agedOut.description: The number of livestock that ceased being members of the group during the period through their increase in age.

close.description: The number of animals in the group at the end of the period
